history.proof: intros f1 f2 f3 f4 T H1 H2. unfold iffH in H1, H2. unfold SysPrf in *. apply reduceImp. + hauto use: iffE1, iffI, cp2, iffE2. + sfirstorder depth: 3use: reduceImp.

ctx: intros f1 f2 f3 f4 T H1 H2.
exceptions.tactic: apply iff_Trans with (f2 := impH (orH f1 f2) (orH f3 f4)).
exceptions.exn: The reference iff_Trans was not found in the current environment.

ctx: intros f1 f2 f3 f4 T H1 H2.
exceptions.exn: In environment L : Language Formula := fol.Formula L : Set Formulas := fol.Formulas L : Set System := fol.System L : Type Term := fol.Term L : Set Terms := fol.Terms L : nat -> Set var := fol.var L : nat -> fol.Term L apply := fol.apply L : forall f : Functions L, fol.Terms L (arity L (inr f)) -> fol.Term L equal := fol.equal L : fol.Term L -> fol.Term L -> fol.Formula L atomic := fol.atomic L : forall r : Relations L, fol.Terms L (arity L (inl r)) -> fol.Formula L impH := fol.impH L : fol.Formula L -> fol.Formula L -> fol.Formula L notH := fol.notH L : fol.Formula L -> fol.Formula L forallH := fol.forallH L : nat -> fol.Formula L -> fol.Formula L orH := fol.orH L : fol.Formula L -> fol.Formula L -> fol.Formula L andH := fol.andH L : fol.Formula L -> fol.Formula L -> fol.Formula L existH := fol.existH L : nat -> fol.Formula L -> fol.Formula L iffH := fol.iffH L : fol.Formula L -> fol.Formula L -> fol.Formula L ifThenElseH := fol.ifThenElseH L : fol.Formula L -> fol.Formula L -> fol.Formula L -> fol.Formula L SysPrf := folProof.SysPrf L : fol.System L -> fol.Formula L -> Prop f1, f2, f3, f4 : Formula T : System H1 : folProof.SysPrf L T (fol.iffH L f1 f3) H2 : folProof.SysPrf L T (fol.impH L f2 f4) Unable to unify "exists (Axm : fol.Formulas L) (_ : Prf L Axm (iffH (impH ?M1437 ?M1438) (impH ?M1439 ?M1440))), forall g : fol.Formula L, In g Axm -> mem (fol.Formula L) ?M1441 g" with "exists (Axm : fol.Formulas L) (_ : Prf L Axm (iffH f2 f4)), forall g : fol.Formula L, In g Axm -> mem (fol.Formula L) T g".

exceptions.exn: Wrong bullet +: Current bullet + is not finished.

ctx: intros f1 f2 f3 f4 T H1 H2.

original: intros f1 f2 f3 f4 T H1 H2. unfold iffH in H1, H2. unfold SysPrf in *. apply iff_Trans with (f2 := impH (orH f1 f2) (orH f3 f4)). - apply reduceImp. + apply reduceOrL in H1. auto. + apply reduceOrL in H2. auto. - apply reduceImp. + apply reduceOrR in H1. auto. + apply reduceOrR in H2. auto.
